Package Components.Lexical.SymbolStyleCustomizer

Classes implementing a SymbolStyleCustomizer component.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISymbolStyleCustomizerComp
    Interface providing services for interacting with other components, like Grammar, Language and RichTextView.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attributes  
    CategoryAttributes
    This class defines a symbol category with its corresponding font and color attributes.
    CSymbolStyleCustomizerComp
    This component holds a mapping from grammar symbols to symbol categories and symbol categories to font and color attributes.
    CSymbolStyleCustomizerCompBeanInfo
    This class implements Java's BeanInfo interface to restrict the SymbolStyleCustomizer features exposed to the public.
    CSymbolStyleCustomizerStructure
    Defines the structural representation of a symbolstylecustomizer.
    FCAttributes
    This class defines the font and color attributes of a symbol.
    ListComboCategoryModel
    An implementation of a table model for Category attributes.
    SymbolCategory
    Defines objects representing a symbol and its category.
    SymbolStyleCustomizerEditor
    A PropertyEditor which allows users to edit the internal structure of a symbolstylecustomizer.
    SymbolStyleCustomizerPropertyEditor
    A PropertyEditor which allows users to edit the internal structure of a SymbolStyleCustomizer.
    SymbolStyleReader
    A utility class for reading the textual representation of symbol styles.
    SymbolToCategoryTableModel
    An implementation of a table model for SymbolToCategory.

Package Components.Lexical.SymbolStyleCustomizer Description

Classes implementing a SymbolStyleCustomizer component.
